issue.title: jlcpcb.com login page does not load

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard URL Tracking filter 2.0.11.81

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login?from=

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Got to jlcpcb.com, press sign in, it redirects to https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login?from= but the `from` parameter is removed by the AdGuard URL Tracking filter and the page does not load.

If I disable the filter list, then this works:
https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login?from=

And this doesn't:
https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

On `fandom.com`, `awoiaf.westeros.org` and `zeldawiki.wiki`

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://loadoutbuilder.gg](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Floadoutbuilder.gg) ### Comment > The global "cookie-content" class filter leaves a layer that makes the website unclickable. > The filter should apply to the "cookie-consent" class (globally or only for loadoutbuilder.gg) for solution. ### Screenshots

?

Please click OK to learn more. Upon clicking OK, you will get this: > > laurafuentes.com > An ad blocker is preventing this page from loading > Ads help me cover the costs of running this site, and I work hard to keep them limited and respectful. Turning off your ad blocker just for this site should fix the issue. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
